products.title: Loretta Apple Roman Blind
products.description: With luscious zestiness and a sweet metallic twist, this loretta apple roman blind brings both colour and character into your home, in a lovely modern way. The textured weave helps the fabric to catch the light at all angles, filling your home with a comfy yet airy vibe.

products.title: Loretta Sky Roman Blind
products.description: Fresh yet cosseting, this loretta sky roman blind reminds us of the warm summer days, gentle waves lapping the sands. And with the metallic twist, this fabric has a sweet twinkle too. The luscious texture of this blind gives your scheme plenty of character, while giving a touch fresh yet cosseting, this loretta sky roman blind reminds us of the warm summer days, gentle waves lapping the sands.

products.title: Loretta Oyster Roman Blind
products.description: This roman blind is an excellent choice, its creamy tone so wonderfully neutral yet it also has a distinctive and gorgeous texture with gently raised ribs that run horizontally. products.title: Loretta Platinum Roman Blind
products.description: This beautifully woven loretta platinum roman blind creates a fabulous textured look and feel at your windows. The metallic, grey fabric contains a drop of warmth to add to its neutral tone. Ideal for matching with low key, natural colours and shades, this beautiful blind is this beautifully woven loretta platinum roman blind creates a fabulous textured look and feel at your windows.

products.title: Loretta Steel Roman Blind
products.description: Its crazy how just when youve seen every sort of fabric going, another one comes along thats nothing like anything youve seen before. And thats exactly how we feel with this loretta steel roman blind. It's so simple and soft, with a whole lot of texture; we were surprise its crazy how just when youve seen every sort of fabric going, another one comes along thats nothing like anything youve seen before.

products.title: Choices Loretta Oyster Roller Blind
products.description: The choices loretta oyster roller blind is one of those window dressings that can pretty much sell itself, but if youre undecided, heres why its a great choice. We dont need to tell you how versatile an off white like this is, but when mixed with the soft texture and choic the choices loretta oyster roller blind is one of those window dressings that can pretty much sell itself, but if youre undecided, heres why its a great choice.

products.title: Choices Loretta Stone & Stone Roller Blind
products.description: Add a bit of sophistication to your window with this stylish choices loretta stone roller blind. The decorative trim is made up of glorious little woven pom-poms that give a wonderful contrast to the elegant texture of the main blind. Not only is the look beautifully designer, add a bit of sophistication to your window with this stylish choices loretta stone roller blind.

products.title: Choices Loretta Oyster & Spring Roller Blind
products.description: Light, bright and just a little bit funky, this choices loretta oyster & spring roller blind is everything you need for a neural space, and then some. It's not just neutral spaces it's perfect for though. Pick out the aqua, frost, lime or sky shades from the pompoms and make light, bright and just a little bit funky, this choices loretta oyster & spring roller blind is everything you need for a neural space, and then some.

products.title: Loretta Stone Roman Blind
products.description: The loretta stone roman blind is just like a modern blanket at your windows, so comfy and cosy, with cool, metallic undertones. The blind has a slight twinkle to it too, which only intensifies these cossetting vibes. And since this blind is dressed in a soothing, and very on t the loretta stone roman blind is just like a modern blanket at your windows, so comfy and cosy, with cool, metallic undertones.
